氶字的基本解释

氶
zhěng
古同“拯”。
〔氶水〕河名，源出中国山东省，流入运河。
古县名，在今中国山东省枣庄市。

氶
chéng
古同“承”。
姓。

氶
zhèng
〔氶乡〕中国汉侯国名。

氶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhěng］
［《廣韻》音蒸，上聲，上拯，章。］
水名。氶水，在今山东省枣庄市境内。参阅清顾祖禹《读史方舆纪要·山东三·兖州府》。

氶字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　氶； 康熙笔画：5； 页码：页603第02
【廣韻】只影切，蒸上聲。與抍同。救助也。一曰縣名。　又人名。【晉書·宗室傳】譙王氶。　又【集韻】辰陵切，音丞。與承??音義?同。奉也，受也。　又【集韻】諸應切，音證。承鄕，漢侯國名。或作氶。互見手部承字註。

氶字的源字形

字源演变：

金文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
氶字的起名意思

水名。氶水，在今山东省枣庄市境内。

氶
Basic explanation of words
氶
zhěng
Gu Tong "Zheng".
〔氶水〕The name of the river originates from Shandong Province in China and flows into the canal.
Ancient county name, in today's Zaozhuang City, Shandong Province, China.
氶
chéng
Gu Tong "inherited".
name.
氶
zhèng
〔氶乡〕The name of the princes of the Han Dynasty in China.
氶
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhěng］
["Guangyun" sound steaming, Shangsheng, Shang Zheng, chapter. ]
Water name. Jianshui, in today's Zaozhuang City, Shandong Province. Refer to Qing Gu Zuyu's "Minutes of Reading History and Fangyu·Shandong San·Yanzhou Mansion".
氶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　氶; Kangxi strokes: 5; Page number: page 603 02
[Guang Yun] Only the shadow cuts, and the sound is steamed. Same as 抍. Relief also. One is the name of the county.　Another name. [Book of Jin·Clan Biography] Qiao Wangjian.　 [Ji Yun] Chen Lingqie, Yin Cheng. Same sound and meaning as Cheng??. Feng Ye, Shou Ye.　[Jiyun] Zhu Yingqie, sound proof. Chengrong, the name of the Hou Han Dynasty. Or as 氶. See each other's hand-carrying notes.
氶
